title: Looking for an Awesome Copywriter
snippet:
Bustling Digital Marketing Agency seeks top-notch and experienced copywriter to create banner and facebook ads. Your job will be to write copy for search ads, banner ads, etc. that will be used for AdWords, Facebook, and other search and social media campaigns.

I’m looking for a creative mind with a knack for taking marketing ideas and turning them into enticing copy. Someone with experience creating ads that grab the eye and imagination.

Sound like you? I want to hear from you! Please include in your proposal samples of previous work.
